entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 02:54 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
